sentence.Network_en: I was rather put off by the shamelessness of his proposal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的无耻提议使我难堪.

sentence.Network_en: At a time when shamelessness , we are often at loss as to who can be trusted.
sentence.Network_cn: 在恬不知耻之风盛行之际, 我们常为谁堪信任感到困惑.

sentence.Network_en: Chinese mind since then are stuffed with barbarian spirit of vulgarity and shamelessness.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国人的神志从那时候起就充斥了野蛮,粗俗和无耻.

means.word_mean: 1. behavior marked by a bold defiance of the proprieties and lack of shame
